00049 void CHPQuantificationFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00050 {
00051         CHPQuantificationFileReader reader;
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00054 
00055 void CHPQuantificationFileReaderTest::testRead()
00056 {
00057         CHPQuantificationData data;
00058         CHPQuantificationFileReader reader;
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_quantification_file"));
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00061 
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_quantification_file");
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 2);
00067         
00068         ParameterNameValueTypeList params = data.GetAlgParams();
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00070         ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it=params.begin();
00071         ParameterNameValueType param = *it;
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"an1");
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"av1");
00074 
00075         params = data.GetSummaryParams();
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00077         it=params.begin();
00078         param = *it;
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"sn1");
00080         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"sv1");
00081 
00082         ProbeSetQuantificationData e;
00083         data.GetQuantificationEntry(0, e);
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "abc");
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.quantification == 10.0f);
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.id == -1);
00087         data.GetQuantificationEntry(1, e);
00088         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "xyz");
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.quantification == 20.0f);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.id == -1);
00091 }
00092 
00093 void CHPQuantificationFileReaderTest::testReadId()
00094 {
00095         CHPQuantificationData data;
00096         CHPQuantificationFileReader reader;
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_quantification_file_id"));
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00099 
00100         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_quantification_file_id");
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgName() == L"sig");
00102         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
00103         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetArrayType() == L"test3");
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetEntryCount() == 2);
00105         
00106         ParameterNameValueTypeList params = data.GetAlgParams();
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00108         ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it=params.begin();
00109         ParameterNameValueType param = *it;
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"an1");
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"av1");
00112 
00113         params = data.GetSummaryParams();
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00115         it=params.begin();
00116         param = *it;
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"sn1");
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"sv1");
00119 
00120         ProbeSetQuantificationData e;
00121         data.GetQuantificationEntry(0, e);
00122         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.id == 10);
00123         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.quantification == 10.0f);
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "");
00125         data.GetQuantificationEntry(1, e);
00126         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.id == 20);
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.quantification == 20.0f);
00128         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.name == "");
00129 }
